app.connectionSuccessfullyEstablished: the strapi config has been successfully updated
app.tokenAlreadySet: a token is already set, if you resubmit this form the current token will be overwritten
app.invalidConfigUrl: the given URL does not belong to a valid Strapi API
app.invalidToken: the given token is not valid
app.invalidTokenPermissions: the given token does not grant permissions to retrieve Contents and/or Collection Types
